title: Implement Send page > Long tap to edit amount send through an specific network

labels.name: E:Mobile Wallet Send Page MVP
labels.description: all issues for the send page of the wallet

body: # Feature Issue ### User Story As a user, I want to long tap to edit the amount of tokens sent through a specific network so that I can customize the transaction value for that network. ### Description Figma Design 1: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2388-503644&mode=design&t=V0dXiJUCqM0Jo7Od-4 Figma Design 2: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2388-503816&mode=design&t=V0dXiJUCqM0Jo7Od-4 Figma Design 3: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2436-519277&mode=design&t=V0dXiJUCqM0Jo7Od-4 Figma Design 4: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2436-519599&mode=design&t=V0dXiJUCqM0Jo7Od-4 Figma Design 5: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2436-519846&mode=design&t=V0dXiJUCqM0Jo7Od-4 Visual reference: ### Acceptance Criteria - [ ] When user long-taps network card in the left column, `Send from ` bottom sheet should be shown - [ ] User can edit the amount sent through that network - [ ] User can press the button at the right of the input to toggle the value in its preferred currency - [ ] When user edit the amount, checkbox with label `Donâ€™t auto recalculate ` should be automatically checked - [ ] Whenever the user wants the amount be auto recalculated for that network, the checkbox should be manually unchecked - [ ] User should be allowed to input any values in this drawer but if they exceed available maximum on that network we'll have an error like on the picture - [ ] If user inputs less than maximum, but other networks do not have enough to cover required amount I believe it should be something like on the picture (Check with design team) - [ ] User should tap the `Update` button to apply changes. Feel free to break up this issue in smaller issues if necessary
